member.name: ITfCompositionSink.OnCompositionTerminated
member.summary: Called when a composition is terminated.
member.param: Contains a TfEditCookie value that identifies the edit context. This is the same value passed for ecWrite in the call to .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ITfCompositionSink
member.summary: The ITfCompositionSink interface is implemented by a text service to receive a notification when a composition is terminated. This advise sink is installed by passing a pointer to this interface when the composition is started with the method.
